thread.title: Rosewood Hotels & Resorts Enters Strategic Partnership with Asia MilesTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: Rosewood Hotels & Resorts Enters Strategic Partnership with Asia MilesTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Rosewood Hotels & Resorts Enters Strategic Partnership with Asia MilesTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Rosewood Hotels & Resorts Enters Strategic Partnership with Asia Miles Published on : Friday, September 11, 2015
To enhance its growing Asia and global brand presence, ultra-luxury Rosewood Hotels & Resorts® has strategically partnered with the Asia Miles reward program to offer its members extra mileage points for staying at any of 18 iconic Rosewood properties including The Carlyle, A Rosewood Hotel in New York, Rosewood Castiglion del Bosco in Tuscany and Rosewood Mansion on Turtle Creek in Dallas, in addition to new classics such as Rosewood London and Rosewood Beijing.
“The Rosewood and Asia Miles partnership is a strategic alliance: with Asia Miles’ extensive network of partner airlines, we can present the Rosewood journey to much broader audience as we continue to expand,” says May Pendraat Kredner, vice president – sales & marketing, Rosewood Hotel Group, management company of Rosewood Hotels & Resorts. “Within just a few years, guests will be able to discover new Rosewood hotels in such desirable destinations as Paris; São Paulo; Puebla in Mexico and Santa Barbara in California; and in Asia in Phuket, Bangkok, Bali, Phnom Penh, Jakarta, Guangzhou, Sanya and Hainan.”
Asia Miles members can now earn an extra 500 mileage points per stay and the mileage point rewards will be tripled to 1,500 for hotel stays completed by 29 February 2016. Visit asiamiles.com for more information or rosewoodhotels.com for reservations.
Source:- Rosewood Hotels & Resort
